metadata.title: CVE-2023-40481 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40481` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

7zip - 23.01+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 7zip package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '23.01+dfsg-3').
